name: Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon Chronicles
overview: What is Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon Chronicles? 2 pieces of the Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon series of nostalgic 2D horizontal scroll action game that expresses an aesthetic and rigorous world view in 8-bit style. The player controls the protagonist "Killzuki", an oriental demon hating demons and alchemists, and challenges the castle of the demons lurking. Switching between multiple characters and playing with their characteristics is the key. The series also features a spectacular story consisting of multiple scenarios supervised by IGA (Takashi Igarashi).
